name: Rune Walker (Demo)
description:
You enjoy exploring abandoned caves, but not long after entering this cave, the entrance collapses behind you. With no way back, you continue to explore the cave, discovering ancient ruins and relics left behind by a long forgotten civilization.

THIS IS A VERY EARLY BUILD
This was made for the Last Minute GameJam. It was my first GameJam so I struggled under the time constraints, but it was fun none the less. I will continue to develop this game. There is A LOT to to add
